transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello ji Basant ji Elma baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se kaise hai sir?
Customer: Ji badhiya madam.
Executive: Ji sir aapka call message ab aaya tha hamare paas update aaya tha call me ka.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Haan bataiye sir.
Customer: Madam ji meri jo profile hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ye grow hi nahi kar pa rahi hai kya ho gaya isme? Na to na koi kuch kuch bhi nahi aata kisi ka. Ye kisi ko dikhai nahi deti.
Executive: Accha.
Executive: Ek second mai dekh leti hu aapki.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ek minute mai check kar le rahi hu use. Grow se kya matlab hai sir matlab customer nahi mil rahe? Kya conversion?
Customer: Matlab customer nahi ek to customer nahi mil raha hai. Aur iske rating bhi ek to pata nahi kaise ja rahe hain. Down down down.
Executive: Iski wo kam hoti ja rahi hai aap keh rahe ho?
Customer: Ji, haan ji.


Executive: Hold sir.
Executive: Ek second sir.


Executive: Sir listing to aapki sahi hai achi hai profile ki. Second number pe dikh rahe hain sir aap.
Customer: Madam kahan dikh raha hu? To phone one kyu nahi aa rahe hain fir mere paas?
Executive: Ship for art ke naam se Shah wooden arts hai. Unki company hai ha bas unki company hai alag se aur aapki company dikh rahi hai. Aur fir aur companies hai aapka.
Customer: Nahi hamare niche kyu hai?
Executive: Sir rotation hota hai na TrustSeal mein. To abhi aap second number pe to dikh hi rahe ho sir aisa thodi hai aap niche ho. First number pe Shah wooden hai aur second number pe aap dikh rahe ho.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To do aapki bhi company dikh rahi hai unki bhi company hai aisa nahi hai sir first second se nahi ab do minute baad aap dekhoge aapki listing upar ho jayegi company ki.
Customer: Aisa kyu?
Executive: Sir wahi to mai bata rahi hu rotation hota hai.
Customer: Profile check karwao aap ye theek hai kya meri? Sab kuch update hai kya?
Executive: Ek second mai dekh leti hu.


Executive: Sir catalog to aapka theek hai sir 131 products added hai properly hai sabka score bhi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To aapki catalog mein to koi issue nahi hai listing bhi achi hai sir aur ek second mai dekh le rahi hu.
Customer: Ye preferred location ye kya cheez hai?
Executive: Preferred location jis hisab se aapne buylead uthai hogi sir.
Customer: Matlab?
Executive: Matlab jis jis area ki aapne lead uthate honge sir aap us hisab se aapka dikha raha hai wo. To isko all over India kar de.
Executive: Sir all over India nahi hota hai wo. Wo aapke buylead ke pattern pe hota hai agar all over India agar karna hai to wo fir package aata hai alag se sir jisme pan India basis pe hota hai.
Customer: To ye kya hai fir? Ye bhi aise hi aapke chipka diya fir.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap nahi sir liya to aapne sahi sir services hai but ye jo preferred cities hai na wo system ke basis pe hai ki aapne jis jis area ki lead uthai hai listing to aapki hai sir company ki but ek jo aap wo keh rahe ho na preferred wo system banata hai ki aapne jis jis area ki lead uthai hai usko wo preferred mein dikhata hai uska all India se koi connection nahi hota sir wo bas aapke pattern ke hisab se hota hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai? Baki listing to achi hai sir company ki koi problem nahi hai catalog bhi proper hai ek cheez hai sir aapke rating aur review ka problem hai ki aap rating reviews jo aapke genuine nahi hai kyuki hamare system ne usko kiya hai. Theek hai? To aapko sir apni rating ka isko theek karwana padega. Genuine rating leni padegi.
Customer: Ab kahan se laau rating? Kyuki abhi jo aapka dikh raha hai na wo bhi jyada non genuine dikh raha hai jo system ne isko capture kiya tha detect kiya tha.
Customer: Non genuine kyu kaise dikha raha hai ye?
Executive: Sir ye to system hamara detect kar leta hai jaise ki abhi aap ye karo ki sir jitne bhi customer hai unse ask for review bhej ke na unse review le lo sir aur waise bhi aapki rating dekhiye kam lead manager mein jaiye.
Customer: Lead manager? Haan usme bhi kisi customer ka open kariye.
Customer: Theek hai. Usme dekhiye niche sir ask for review ka option hai.
Customer: Kahan hai madam isme ask for review?
Executive: Dekhiye aap hai. Haan ji. Wahan pe dekhiye sir ask for review option hai. Dekha?
Customer: Nahi madam nahi dikha raha.
Executive: Kisi bhi customer ka open kariye sir wahan side mein dekhiye teen link hai teen upar teen dots hai na sir?
Customer: Accha samajh gaya mil gaya. Haan. Wo apne sare customer ko bhej dijiye sir.
Customer: Usse kya hoga?
Executive: Usse kya hoga usme se jo ye jitne bhi aapke IndiaMART ke connected customers hai na wo aapse connect kar lenge aur agar unko review dena hoga to wo aapko review de denge aur ek bar aap verbally bhi unko call pe bol dijiyega is cheez ke liye sir.
Customer: Aur kisi ne agar rating kam dal di?
Executive: Sir abhi aapko rating 3.5 ki aapki rating chal rahi hai company ki.
Customer: Mai wahi to keh raha hu madam.
Executive: Sir to kam hai na company ki aap unse teen teen char logo se mang lijiye rating agar wo de denge to aapki rating badh jayegi company ki.
Customer: Kitni ho jayegi?
Executive: Sir aap wo to dekhiye four cross ho jayegi probably.
Customer: Accha. Haan.
Executive: Theek hai aise catalog to theek hai sir ek bar mai dekh leti hu aapki lead reach ka aur fir aapse connect karti hu.
Customer: Theek hai check kijiye.
Executive: Theek. Theek hai sir. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Profile is not growing, no calls received.

- Rating and reviews are not genuine.



Resolution:

- Informed about rotation in TrustSeal.

- Suggested sending 'ask for review' to customers.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check lead reach and connect.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, listing, trustseal, rating, review, buylead
